description: This Java class 'AuditAware' serves as a base class for entities that require auditing features, such as tracking creation and modification timestamps and users. It uses Spring Data annotations and integrates with JPA auditing.

classes.name: AuditAware
classes.description: A base class providing auditing fields for created and modified timestamps and user identifiers, with versioning support. Uses Lombok for getters and setters, and Spring Data JPA annotations for auditing.

methods.name: AuditAware()
methods.description: Default constructor (implicit, not explicitly defined in source).
